eveHQMessage.title: 3 Fixes
eveHQMessage.message:
Fixes for blueprint calculator, fitting T3 ships and missile damage analysis

[Prism][Bug] Blueprint calculator throws an exception on open.

[Fitter][Bug] Contextual command "Find Module To Fit" on T3 subsystem slots spams a error message dialog.

[Fitter][Bug] Missile damage analysis handled incorrectly. It is a bug with a long history. If your targed doesn't move you had 0 damage on it in a missile ship. I've corrected it but need your help to test the DPS numbers for different circumstances like target signature, target speed and your missiles type.

Please report bugs on our Forum(bugs reports section) or better on our GitHub project's issue tracker

Join us on:Twitter|Facebook|Google+|Website
